articles.title: Israel, Hezbollah trade strikes as death toll rises from Beirut attack - CBS News
articles.description: The U.S. Department of State issued a travel advisory on Saturday urging Americans to depart Lebanon.
articles.content: The death toll from a "targeted attack" by the Israeli military on a Beirut suburb Friday rose to 37, including seven women and three children, Lebanon's health minister said on Saturday, as Israel a… [+6842 chars]

articles.title: Texas football vs. ULM: Live score updates, highlights as Longhorns take big lead after 1Q - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: It's Texas vs. ULM in Week 4 of the 2024 college football season. Follow our live game and score updates as Arch Manning makes his first career start.
articles.content:
Heisman Trophy candidate Quinn Ewers is out at quarterback for Texas football, and touted backup Arch Manning is in as the starter at least for one week.
